name: Howard University
scholarship_info: HUFS: freshman merit & need‑based scholarships. Karsh STEM Scholars program offers tuition+room/board/books for STEM majors. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

name: Stony Brook University
scholarship_info: Merit scholarships available; mostly a public university.

name: University of California, Santa Cruz
scholarship_info: Regents Scholarship ($5,000/year, renewable for 4 years for freshmen, based on academic merit); Ruth Emma Johnson Scholarship (scholastic ability and need); Katherine M. and Raymond R. Sage Scholarship (need-based); William H. Snyder Scholarship (merit-based); Adolph C. Miller Scholarship (need-based). Check https://financialaid.ucsc.edu for more.

name: SUNY Polytechnic Institute
scholarship_info: SUNY Poly offers merit-based and need-based scholarships for CS and CE students. Check the financial aid office at https://sunypoly.edu for specific CS/IT scholarships.

name: University of Houston
scholarship_info: Great Minds in STEM HENAAC Scholarship (for STEM students, $2,500–$5,000, 3.0+ GPA); Microsoft Scholarship (CS/STEM, merit-based, leadership focus). Check https://uh.edu for additional scholarships.

name: University of North Texas
scholarship_info: College of Engineering Dean’s Scholarship (merit-based, $1,000+); Benjamin T. Hamilton Memorial Scholarship (for CS majors, preference for students with disabilities); Gene Fuhrman Memorial Scholarship (CS/IT, preference for Muenster/Cooke County, TX graduates); Siemens PLM Software Scholarship ($5,000 for dual-degree students). Apply via https://engineering.unt.edu.

name: San Diego State University
scholarship_info: UCSD scholarships (applicable to SDSU via system-wide programs) include merit-based awards ($2,000–$5,000) and need-based awards for CS/CE students. Check https://sdsu.edu/financialaid for details.

name: Indiana University–Purdue Indianapolis
scholarship_info: IUPUI offers School of Engineering and Technology scholarships for CS and CE students, including merit and need-based awards. Check https://iupui.edu for details.

name: Portland State University
scholarship_info: Maseeh College of Engineering and Computer Science offers scholarships for CS/CE/IT students. Check https://pdx.edu/financial-aid for specific opportunities.

name: University of Central Arkansas
scholarship_info: UCA offers STEM scholarships for CS/IT students through the College of Natural Sciences and Mathematics. Check https://uca.edu/financialaid for details.
